overview: BG originally created the series, Fantasy Fights, to feature leading porn stars of the day in wrestling scenarios. It was important that at least one of the two would know how to wrestle and how to apply holds. If the other also knew how to wrestle, it would be a bonus. If he didn't, then it would be a squash job. That was the fight part. The Fantasy part was seeing your favorite porn stars in a wrestling scenario, something not usually shown in the adult video world. Steve Marks, a porn star who didn't know how to wrestle, was engaging in a long-held personal Fantasy of his own, getting it on with a huge porn and physique star, Tom Katt.
title: Fantasy Fight 6
